mil7.3.2:1.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, padumaṁ udake jātaṁ udake saṁvaddhaṁ anupalittaṁ udakena;
mil7.3.2:1.3_1: yoginā yogāvacarena kule gaṇe lābhe yase sakkāre sammānanāya paribhogapaccayesu ca sabbattha anupalittena bhavitabbaṁ.
mil7.3.2:1.4_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, padumassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.3.2:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, padumaṁ udakā accuggamma ṭhāti;
mil7.3.2:2.2_1: yoginā yogāvacarena sabbalokaṁ abhibhavitvā accuggamma lokuttaradhamme ṭhātabbaṁ.
mil7.3.2:2.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, padumassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.3.2:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, padumaṁ appamattakenapi anilena eritaṁ calati;
mil7.3.2:3.2_1: yoginā yogāvacarena appamattakesupi kilesesu saṁyamo karaṇīyo,
mil7.3.2:3.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, padumassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.3.2:3.4_1: bhagavatā devātidevena ‘aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesū’”ti.
